word:
The Sacred and the Strange Fire. 

     He will represent the sacredness of the work, he will magnify the truth, and will ever present before men and angels the holy perfume of the character of Christ. This is the sacred fire of God's own kindling. Anything aside from this 


                        - 14 - 

is strange fire, abhorrent to God, and the more offensive as one's position in the work involves larger responsibilities.
